description:
Lapischain (hereafter referred to as “LPS Golden Stone Chain”) is an online game community ecological world based on distributed smart contracts.

The decentralized gaming application built on the LPS Golden Stone Chain System inherits the features and advantages of blockchain technology, and it will perfectly solve the unreasonable aspects of the current online game industry: including cross-platform payment issues, traditional game platform operations are not  open and opaque, legal risks, potential risk of platform-laundering, financial security issues, and concerns about operator cheating.

LPS Golden Stone Chain establishes each player's security file on the platform, protects the player's privacy, provides global game payment methods, incentives to connect players around the world, directly connect players and games with artificial intelligence, reduce game intermediaries, let  Players and developers can get more benefits.
name: Lapis Chain
